short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just type Amharic from your browser, no internet connection Needed!!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy amaregna is a chrome extension that helps you type Amharic, Tigregna and Ge’ez from your computer, tablet,phone or any device you want to use, it is free and you can use it as you wish.


After you add the extension to your browser, open the app(extension) and type by Amharic(Ge’ez) characters and copy the text, then paste it any where you like, you can use with or with out internet connection, thank you!!
